Replace.Text: [SIZE_16]Declare Golden Age War[NEWLINE][SIZE_12]
[SIZE_16]Declare War of Retribution[NEWLINE][SIZE_12]
[SIZE_16]Declare Ideological War[NEWLINE][SIZE_12]
Target power must have recently broken a promise to you.
Target power must have a different Tier 3 government than you.
You must be in a Golden Age with "To Arms!" as a Dedication.
Alliance Renewal Request
{1_name} has requested to extend the Alliance between your civilizations.
Alliance Renewal Accepted
{1_name} has accepted your Alliance renewal.
Alliance Renewal Rejected
{1_name} has rejected your Alliance renewal.
Our Alliance has been of great benefit to both of our peoples. I propose that we renew it.
I'm glad you agree.
Darn, I thought we would be allies forever.
That sounds like a great idea. We accept.
We do not wish to continue this course of action with you at this time.
We would be pleased to extend our Alliance.
We do not wish to extend this Alliance.
Yes, for the sake of our future prosperity.
Yes, this has benefited both our civilizations.
Yes, let us renew this alliance.
Of course! Have we not fought long together? Our foes speak our names with fear!
Of course! Have we not fought long together? Our foes speak our names with fear!
It's only right that we should continue our Alliance.
Yes, I would hate to give up the benefit of your company.
Yes. I embrace any opportunity to continue our close relationship.
Things now are different than they were before. We cannot renew the Alliance.
No. This Alliance is no longer in our interests.
No. There's no need to renew this Alliance.
No. It cannot be as it was.
No. It cannot be as it was.
America will go her own way, as befits a first-rate power.
I must decline your close company. For now.
No. My love of this Alliance has faded.
Our Alliance has brought peace and prosperity to our civilizations. Let us renew it.
We should renew the Alliance which has been so beneficial to both our civilizations.
Shall we renew our Alliance? We both benefit by this agreement.
Renew our alliance, friend! We will find joy together as we vanquish our foes!
Renew our alliance, friend! We will find joy together as we vanquish our foes!
Let us renew our Alliance! Then let us celebrate the occasion with a vigorous wrestling match!
Shall we continue our Alliance? You would be sorry if you were to miss my parties.
We have grown so close in this Alliance. Surely you will not pull away from me now?
Excellent. Both our civilizations will grow stronger through this.
Very good. Peace and prosperity will continue.
I'm glad you see the benefits that this Alliance has brought us.
Let us rejoice at our combined strength! I hear our enemies' teeth chattering with fear!
Let us rejoice at our combined strength! I hear our enemies' teeth chattering with fear!
Bully!
Oh good. I would hate for you to miss anything important.
I am pleased.
A disappointing decision, to be sure.
I hope you do not regret this decision.
A pity that you feel that way.
No matter. I have strength enough without you.
No matter. I have strength enough without you.
America's power is only rising. You would have been wise to accept my offer.
How disappointing and short-sighted of you.
No doubt some other civilization has caught your eye. Find your comfort with them, then.
Renew Alliance
End Alliance
(Declares a Golden Age War against you)
(Has joined an Emergency against you)
(Declares a War of Retribution against you)
(Declares an Ideological War against you)
(Declares a joint Golden Age War against you)
(Declares a joint War of Retribution against you)
(Declares a joint Ideological War against you)
It is good that our relationship is built on the strength of knowing other people’s secrets.
You must enjoy the reports of your envoys and spies as much as I do!
The next time I send a delegation to you, the leader will have a big, fat dossier full of good secrets. Make sure no one’s around when you open it.
Maybe you’ve heard whispers that I consider you to be one of my best sources. But who listens to what people say? Besides you and I, of course.
I often wonder why you say so little. I believe you’ve nothing interesting to say.
Our poets and philosophers hold up your civilization as the light of the world, and I must agree with them.
Your personal magnificence is reflected in the glory of your civilization!
The people of every civilization look upon you with wonder. You are an inspiration to the world!
I look upon your civilization and its works, and I understand why your people are praised in song and story around the world.
Your civilization is the model on which I will build the new Russia!
What could be better than to surround oneself with such poets and playwrights, saints and scientists? I have always thought that a great nation is a manifestation of the blessings of the Almighty.
Yes! Your excellence—your Arete—is truly worthy of emulation!
Aspire to be a worthier example to the rest of the world! Your people will love you if you lead them to glory.
Our civilization admires the way you’re bearing your current trouble with hardiness and resolve.
You bear the suffering of your Dark Age with such nobility! I wish my subjects were as stalwart as you!
I am sending you a gift: A ring inscribed with “This Too Shall Pass.” May it comfort you in times of trouble.
A lesser leader would be unable to do what you are doing: Keeping firm control of your civilization in a time of crisis.
I admire the way you rule. I appreciate not having to come up with a complicated strategy to conquer your civilization.
Your heart must ache for the suffering of your people. Poland understands your plight, and we pray for you.
You, too, know what it means to resist the cruelty of the powerful. Mapuche respect what you do.
You are tied to the cycle of samsara now. I pray unceasingly that you will soon be liberated, and at peace.
Your people's "glorious age" looks a lot like gloating to me. I look forward to the day of your fall.
(You do not gossip enough.)
(You are in a dark age.)
(You are in a golden age.)
